channel.title: 0mfg my server pissing me off can you help meh plz
channel.description:
hello well i added a npc knight to shout out safe zone and stick to pk rules and i compiled and im gettin errors i have 8 but now i fixed 2 so it sayes
NPCHandler.java:824: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^ NPCHandler.java:825: illegal start of expression public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:1046: illegal start of expression public static int worldmap2[][] = { ^ NPCHandler.java:1055: illegal start of expression public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn't remove - xerozcheez
^ NPCHandler.java:1056: illegal start of expression public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2}; ^ NPCHandler.java:1058: illegal start of expression public static int randomremoveschaos() ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .
